Dear Geeta Manjal, 

 

Greetings. 

 

Please note that surveyor attended at Agility Warehouse # 10, Al Sulay Area, Riyadh, to conduct survey on 22 July 2025.

 

Consignees can proceed for the delivery as is customary 

 

In general the items appeared sound except few scratches to some and Plywood panel of 1 furniture item appeared broken, which can be locally repaired/ replaced.









We now await without prejudice the documents as required under the terms of the insurance policy including:

 

1.	Identifying the claimed items in the invoice;
2.	Customs  and customs brokers report for damage.
3.	Claim submitted to the responsible parties holding them liable and inviting them for a joint survey.
4.	Repair proposal and final claim statement on letterhead 
5.	GIG claim form duly completed

 

Thanks and kind regards,

Inayat
